result.title: Answer of problem A1-Theatre Square
result.content:
It is not hard to do so. This problem is very easy. The code is just down there:

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long n,m,a;
    scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&m,&a);
    if(n%a==0)
    {
        n=n/a;
    }
    else
    {
        n=n/a+1;
    }
    if(m%a==0)
    {
        m=m/a;
    }
    else
    {
        m=m/a+1;
    }
    printf("%lld",n*m);
    return 0;
}
